product_name: Shimano Click'R CT70 Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: New to clipless pedals? The Shimano Click'R CT70 bike shoes feature a solid platform for cycling and a comfortable walking design. Shoes are great for commuting and cycle touring. Synthetic leather/nylon mesh uppers are ruggedly built for long wear; breathable mesh aids ventilation. Traditional lace-up closures for even tension; rip-and-stick closure straps over laces hold feet securely. Built on a generous last for a roomy and more accommodating toe box. Reinforced toe helps protect the uppers from brush and toe-clip abrasion. EVA midsoles enhance pedaling efficiency and walking comfort; fiberglass reinforcement enhances rigidity, stability and support. Recessed cleat attachment points in the Shimano Click'R CT70 bike shoes make for easy walking. Rubber tread pattern delivers walking traction. Cleats not included on these Shimano Click'R CT70 bike shoes.
short_description: New to clipless pedals? The Shimano Click'R CT70 bike shoes feature a solid platform for cycling and a comfortable walking design. Shoes are great for commuting and cycle touring.
